means: 将…拖上岸（beach的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: We beached the canoe, running it right up the bank.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们把独木舟径直划到岸边，并拖上岸。

sentence.Network_en: The boat beached on a mud flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 船搁浅在一片淤泥滩上。

库塔海滩(Kuta Beach)号称巴厘岛上最美丽的海岸，这里的海滩平坦、沙粒洁白、细腻,是个玩冲浪、滑板的乐园。这里附近有热闹的 …

entry.def: A beach is an area of sand or stones beside the sea.

example.ex: I just want to lie on the beach in the sun.
example.tran: 我只想躺在海滩上晒晒太阳。

entry.def: If something such as a boat beaches, or if it is beached, it is pulled or forced out of the water and onto land.

example.ex: We beached the canoe, running it right up the bank...
example.tran: 我们把独木舟径直划到岸边，并拖上岸。

example.ex: The boat beached on a mud flat...
example.tran: 船搁浅在一片淤泥滩上。

auth_sentence.content: Once in shallow waters these individuals are easily beached in rough seas and heavy storms.
